column4: when i try to install wine from "add remove applications" i get an error saying "the application conflicts with another installed application to install wine you must remove conflicting software first" what does that mean and how do i resolve that?
type   sudo apt-get install wine   in a terminal, and put the full output on http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org
paste the link here so I can see it :)
after you do that, try installing wine again
